title: 40’ Heavy-Duty Shop Vacuum Hose – Blue Dust Collector - 1-1/2” Helix Design Shop Vac Hose - Polymer Dust Collection Hose w/Swiveling Ports Prevent Twisting & Tangling
features: Heavy-Duty Dust Collection: Superior flexibility makes this extra-long hose easy to coil, uncoil and maneuver around obstacles. This dust collection fitting includes dust right 40' heavy-duty shop vacuum hose, 1-1/2'' ID hose port, 2-1/4'' OD hose port.
Extra Long Blue Vacuum Hose: This premium-quality extra-long dust collector accessory is a generous 40' long, it is the maximum length that will fit on our shop vacuum hose reel (sold separately).

Helix Design: Unlike typical shop vacuum dust collection systems for woodworking, this one uses a helix design with no memory, so it uncoils beautifully every time. This dust collector fitting won't kink or crush, so you won't have to fight to get around corners and obstacles.
Durable Construction: This shop dust collector hose is built from a durable yet supple polymer and includes swiveling ports that help prevent twisting and tangling.
Ideal for? Our rockler dust collection hose is ideal for users who prefer to leave their shop vacuum in one central location, and pull out just the dust collecting hose for cleanup.
description: Rockler Vacuum & Dust Collector Hoses: Try our shop dust collector for quick cleanups at your workshops and garages. This shop-vac hose is ideal for use with our shop vacuum hose reel. Extend the reach of your shop vacuum with a long, flexible, and high-quality dust collection vacuum hose. The flexible shop vacuum hose is free-moving and capable of sucking up dust, dirt, and debris. --- What Included: Dust Right 40' Heavy-Duty Shop Vacuum Hose - 1-1/2'' ID Hose Port - 2-1/4'' OD Hose Port. --- About Us: The history of Rockler Woodworking and Hardware goes back to 1954, when Norton Rockler started the Minnesota Woodworkers Supply Company in north Minneapolis. It was a small mail-order business with a big aspiration – to become woodworkers' go-to resource for everything they need to complete their projects.
